start.description: You glance at your surroundings, the smell of damp earth fills your nostrils. You are in a dark cave. You have no memory of how you got here. You see a lit hole in the wall infront of you.

shrineSTART.description: As you go through the hole, you notice you are now in a shrine. There are lit candles and a statue of what appears to be a god of death. You notice a glowing orb on the altar.

orb.description: A glowing orb that seems to be pulsating with energy. It seems to be calling out to you.

interact.description: You reach out to touch the orb and as you do, you feel a surge of energy coursing through your body. You feel a sense of power and purpose. You feel like you have been chosen by the god of death.

shrine.description: You are in the shrine. The orb is still glowing on the altar. a sense of purpose fills you.

gameSTART.description: You notice you are inside a dungeon, the walls are damp and the air is musty. There is only one way out, forward.

store.description: You are in a store. The storekeeper stands behind a grate, he is a hooded figure with a skeletal face who seems to be unreactive. You feel a chill run down your spine as you look at him. He seems to be waiting for you to make a purchase. "store view" to view items

hallOfEchoes.description: You enter a vast hall filled with echoes of past adventurers. The walls are lined with ancient runes that glow faintly. You feel a sense of history and danger.

ancientScroll.description: An ancient scroll that contains forgotten knowledge.

interact.description: You read the scroll and feel your mind expand with new knowledge.
